entity.name: Hong Kong declares coronavirus outbreak an 'emergency'
entity.description: The city’s leader, Carrie Lam, also extended school holidays until February 17, suspended official visits to mainland China and said this year’s Hong Kong Marathon would not take place.

entity.name: Group of protesters set fire to planned quarantine building in Hong Kong
entity.description: Demonstrators torched the lobby of a residential building reportedly planned to be used as a quarantine facility. It comes as fears over the coronavirus outbreak rise in the city.

text:
@realDonaldTrump Hong Kong government refused to close our border to China. Hordes of novel coronavirus patients are coming. We need help from US! Please send medical army to Hong Kong! We don’t want to become Wuhan! Please save us! 
@HawleyMO @SenTedCruz @marcorubio https://t.co/thPgo5t9d2
